captions.text: No, I... I ain't, I ain't talking about that freak, alright?
How do I get this f#@%ing thing off!?
One shudders to imagine what inhuman thoughts lie behind that mask.
[O.S.] What dreams of chronic and sustained cruelty?
♫ how the music can free her whenever it starts. ♫
♫ And it's magic, if the music is groovy. ♫
♫ It makes you feel happy like an old-time movie. ♫
♫ I'll tell you about the magic, it'll free your soul, ♫
♫ but it's like trying to tell a stranger about rock and roll. ♫
♫ If it’s jug band music or rhythm and blues. ♫
♫ Your feet start tapping and you can't seem to find... ♫
♫ how you got there, so just blow your mind. ♫
♫ If you believe in magic, come along with me. ♫
♫ We'll dance until morning, just you and me. ♫
♫ And maybe, if the music is right... ♫

comments.author: Myles Ramsey

comments.text:
I hate how people are like "oh pyro's a homo male cuz game theory said so."
Pyro's gender still isn't confirmed! Here are my reasons:
1.) okay everyone's gonna say "pyro has Schizophrenia and Schizophrenia is 
more common in men so Pyro's a guy." Actually, pyro wears a Optical mask. 
It even says that on the front of the mask.
2.) Pyro's torso looks bigger because pyro is wearing such a poofy fire 
suit.
3.) if you look at fireproof/fire resistant gloves online, you can see that 
the gloves are all the same and if you look at Pyro's hand their the same. 
It's not how Pyro's hand was made, it's how the glove was made.
so yea
thx for reading﻿
